page.title: 15HOUSING IN GRANGE/BUTETOWN
page.content: The housing in the area falls into four main categories, each in its own grid. {Residential (160750) The houses off Sloper Road are semi-detached with their own garage.There is a new housing estate being built at the site of the Old Allotment Gardens (167753) and will consist of flats, bungalows and semi-detached houses. {Residential / Commercial (170750) The houses off Cornwall Street are semi-detached with their own garage, but the bulk of the houses in this grid are terraced without a garage. These houses are over 60 years old, and many people are receiving government grants to renovate them. To the north of Cornwall Street there is a high rise block of flats - The Elizabethan Flats. (contd 16)
